div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h1: Executive Order 2020-35 closed all school buildings for the remainder of the year. Learning Plans are being put in place by teachers and can be found here. The latest meal forms can be found here.

img.alt: BAS Offers Meal Service During Closure

a.span: BAS Offers Meal Service During Closure

div.p: UPDATE: April 22, 2020We are grateful to be able to offer free breakfast and lunch to all children under the age of 18 or any special needs adult under the age of 26....

a.span: Gov. Whitmer Signs "Stay Home, Stay Safe" Executive Order

div.p: In effect tonight, Govenor Whitmer has ordered all non-critical businesses to temporarily close. This order will be in place for the next three weeks and will hopefully...
As you have all probably heard, Governor Whitmer has announced the closure of all K-12 schools from March 16th-April 5th. This means that there will be no classes,...

p.a: Event: 2 hr. Delay-10:25 a.m. School Starts

div.p:
Viking Art Challenege (K-5 Yearbook Cover Contest). If you are in K-5 create an elementary yearbook cover design. You can win a free yearbook! More details are in the video. Junior high and high schoolers can create any art related to Vikings. Send me a picture of what you create to be entered into to win my artwork from this video or to enter the cover contest! I also need to keep track of who does it for my records. Send completed art to vklein@baragaschools.org or to the Baraga Area Schools Art Facebook messenger.
https://youtu.be/2-ndR8fkR1A

2019-2020 elementary yearbooks are for sale online now. Delivery will be next fall as always. The deadline to order and create your custom pages by is July 3rd. With the school shutdown we will be adding photos of things your students are doing at home (with your permission) and 2 pandemic fill in the questions pages. Any questions about ordering contact Mrs. Klein.

Administration has put together a letter with some answers to some frequently asked questions. We hope this helps to clear up some of the confusion. Also, remember that there is locker content pick-up tomorrow from 10a-2p for grades 1-4 and 6-12.
Desk contents from grades 2-4 can be picked up this Friday as well from 10a-2p.

Parents and Guardians,
Locker contents can be picked up from the school this Friday, 4/24/2020, from 10a-2p. The process will be similar to the homework pick-up and will be done from the gym doors by central office. Please practice social distancing during pick-up.

Baraga Area Schools
210 Lyons St
Baraga, MI 49908
Phone: 906-353-6664
